actionTemplate.title: Pick concealer tones for each concern
steps: Use a skin-tone concealer for pores and small flaws.
Use a peach/salmon corrector for dark circles.
Use a green corrector for redness and visible capillaries.
Use a brightening yellow/neutral tone for tear trough and fine lines.
Blend by tapping; keep the under-eye layer thin.

rationaleTemplate: Right undertone improves coverage without heaviness.
